thread.section_title: Hotel de Seze - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent centrally located hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent centrally located hotel - Review of Hotel de Seze, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: nitram1983
title: Excellent centrally located hotel
text:
This was my first visit to Paris and the hotel was great right in the centre of Paris. Located in the middle of the shopping district and walking distance to the majority of the sights.
Rooms are very tastefully decorated and compact, containing everything you need including a Nespresso machine.
Not much nightlife in the area but there is a metro station less than a minute away allowing you to easily explore other areas of the city and the helpful hotel staff will offer suggestions if you ask.
If I were to visit Paris again I would probably stay in Monmatra or Le Marais just because there is more going on in an evening and I wouldn't be as interested in the big tourist attractions. However I would highly recommend Hotel de Seze to anyone visiting Paris and wanting to see the sights.
Room Tip: Ask for a room high up and at the back to avoid traffic noise. See more room tips
